Message.MsgText: CWMMS0508E=CWMMS0508E: Unable to read maintenance mode configuration for server {0} on node {1}. The specified server is not defined or does not support maintenance mode.
Message.Explanation: The server.maintenancemode property was not found in the server configuration. Either the server name is incorrect, the server is incorrectly configured, or it does not support maintenance mode.
Message.UserResponse: Specify the name of a server that supports maintenance mode.
